tool_description: Elevate your sports experience with our API! 🏆 Get real-time betting odds, live scores 📈📊, rankings 🏆, and match details 📖 for Football ⚽, Tennis 🎾, Basketball 🏀, Cricket 🏏, and more! We're here to make your sports journey unforgettable. Try it now and join the excitement! 🥳🏅
name: Sports Live Scores
title: Sports Live Scores

api_list.name: Odds by Match ID
api_list.description: Independently from the sport, here you can retrieve odds for multiple markets from the Match ID.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: You can retrieve this values from the endpoint associated to the sport you are interested in.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sports-live-scores.p.rapidapi.com/get_odds/11352563"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-live-scores.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sports-live-scores.p.rapidapi.com/get_odds/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-live-scores.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Tennis Rankings
api_list.description: Returns ATP or WTA Standings for a given number of players.

required_parameters.name: n_players
required_parameters.description: Number of players to be displayed. Max: 1000.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sports-live-scores.p.rapidapi.com/tennis/rankings/atp/50"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-live-scores.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sports-live-scores.p.rapidapi.com/tennis/rankings/{category}/{n_players}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-live-scores.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Handball Match Statistics
api_list.description: Returns Statistics about a given match_id. The match does not have to be necessarily live but also finished. You can retrieve Match IDs from the Handball Live Matches endpoint.

required_parameters.name: match_id
required_parameters.description: You can retrieve Match IDs from the Handball Live Matches endpoint.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sports-live-scores.p.rapidapi.com/football/match_details/10341120"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-live-scores.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sports-live-scores.p.rapidapi.com/football/match_details/{match_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-live-scores.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
